item.title: Apache Wsgi Configuration
item.description: TLDR; In this post I have put down my experience in configuring apache to interact with apps written in Python. The bulk of this post is about how to set up Gunicorn as a WSGI HTTP Server to launch Python application(s) using the Flask micro-framework and Apache to act as a frontend reverse proxy.
